data.title: Great authentic mexican food
data.text: Great tasting and very authentic Mexican food. They have some of the best tacos and burritos around. Small place big portions, small prices, Everything that we have tried here have been exceptional. Have not been disappointed with anything that we have ordered.

data.title: Best Carne Asada Nachos
data.text: I love El Guerrero! I moved to LA but whenever I am in Santa Maria, I always make it a priority to go to El Guerrero to get my favorite Carne Asada Nachos. The food is delicious!

data.title: Taqueria Guerrero #2
data.text: This is NOT the one in Santa Maria, but in Grover Beach, but got error messages on this site -- didn't show this site.   Anyway, my friend and I ordered the Caldo de Res and another friend ordered the omelet with ham, chorizo, and cheese.  This came with beans and rice, so the plate was full and she could eat only half.  There's a "cart" with condiments of salsa, onions, cilantro, jalapeños, etc.  The salsa (which you go up to get) was very good with the chips.  The caldo had potatoes, carrots, beef, and I think maybe some chayote.  The fixings - cilantro, onion, and lime were brought to us.  We were there around 9:00 a.m., and given another hour, I think the beef would have been very tender.
